1.title: What Makes a Murderer?
1.plot: This episode looks back over five years and 40 episodes of Britain's Darkest Taboos and examines what we can learn from some of the most disturbing familial crimes in British criminal history.

2.title: My Sister, Driven to Her Death by Her 'safe Bet' Husband
2.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

3.title: My Mother Murdered by Her Golden Boy Son
3.plot: In December 2014, a young Scottish man calls 999 reporting his mother missing. Two weeks later, her corpse is found under a caravan. In the days after his mother's murder, the man spends her money on clubbing and alcohol. How could someone do this to the person who brought them into this world?

4.title: He Trapped Our Sons in the Attic Then Set Fire to the House
4.plot: On the 22nd October 2014 Darren Sykes lures his sons Jack and Paul into the attic with the promise of a new train set. He then sets fire to the house, leaving the children, and himself, no way of escaping.

5.title: My Secret Torment: I Was Abused by My Father
5.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

6.title: Our Father Killed Our Mother and Left Our Family Divided
6.plot: Assia Newton is planning a fresh start after ending her violent and abusive marriage to Kelvin Newton. Then, on July 14th 2013, Kelvin Newton enters the family home and strangles his wife to death with a dog lead.

7.title: My Stepfather Took My Sister as a Lover Then Stabbed Her to Death
7.plot: In February 2014, Leanne Meecham is stabbed to death at her Southend home. The killer is revealed to be Simon Meecham, her stepfather and overbearing abusive lover.

1.title: I Had My Killer Brother's Baby
1.plot: Britain's Darkest Taboos talk to the victims of convicted rapist and killer David Jaggers. Jaggers raped his sister Vicky when she was just 12 years old and as a result she gave birth to their daughter, Kirsty. She kept the rapes and the identity of Kirsty's father a secret for 18 years until she went to police. During the 18 years of silence, Vicky's brother, David Jaggers went on to kill his girlfriend Helen Mitchell and also was convicted of other sexual offences against women before his arrest after a police siege in 2005. For the first time, David and Vicky's ...

2.title: Murdered for a Free Breakfast
2.plot: In 2010, a young girl is found dead in Wales. Shockingly, the perpetrator is her school friend who was dared to commit this appalling act under the offer of a free breakfast.

3.title: Violence, Drugs and Prostitution: The Murder of Kirsty Grabham
3.plot: In April 2009, Kirsty Grabham was murdered by her husband Paul Grabham. Her battered body was found in a tiny suitcase after it was thrown from the M4. There was a huge murder investigation in Swansea which made headline news when it was revealed that Kirsty and her husband both worked as escorts. We reveal the truth about their marriage within the sex industry and the horrific murder, plus how Grabham tried to get away with the killing. We interview Kirsty's mother, Cathy Broomfield, and her sister Sonya, and we reveal the other side to the Kirsty they knew, not the ...

4.title: Five Murders, One Family... One Killer
4.plot: In October 2000 in a tiny hamlet in Cornwall, police discovered the bodies of Lesley Ford and her four eldest children, buried in a woodshed in the garden of the family home they shared with Lesley's husband and step-father to the children, Lee Ford. It was a crime that shocked the nation. Ford confessed to killing them all one by one by garotting them in the kitchen of the family home, before burying their bodies. Now, for the first time since the murders 12 years ago, Lesley's ex-husband and biological father of their four children, Michael Tranter, talks about what...

5.title: Killed by Her Pen Pal Lover
5.plot: In February 2006, 19-year-old Carly Fairhurst was killed by her boyfriend, convicted killer Darren Pilkington. Pilkington had already served time for killing a friend in 2000. At the age of 15 Carly began writing to 'Pilky', a friend of her brother's in jail. He murdered her within two years of coming out of prison. In this incredibly powerful story we reveal what happened and the impact Carly's death has had on her family and friends. With exclusive access to home video footage of Carly, plus interviews with her parents Trevor and Sheila, we discover that she was a ...

6.title: Murdered for Reporting Rape
6.plot: In 2010, Jane Clough, a nurse from Blackpool, is murdered by her violent ex-husband after she reported him to the police for raping her.

1.title: Mick Philpott: The Man Who Tried to Murder Me
1.plot: Mick Philpott became a symbol of hate across the nation when he was convicted of manslaughter following a flawed benefit scam which saw six of his children die. In a television exclusive, CI discovers the harrowing story of how, over 30 years previous, Philpott stabbed his then teenage girlfriend, Kim Hill, 27 times. Leaving her for dead, Philpott then went onto attack Kim's mother, Shirley, stabbing her 11 times.

2.title: Danielle Jones: My Daughter Was Abducted and Murdered by Her Uncle
2.plot: We talk to the mother of 15 year old Essex schoolgirl Danielle Jones who was abducted and murdered by her uncle Stuart Campbell in June 2001. Danielle�۪s body has never been found. Campbell was a secret paedophile who liked to take photographs of underage girls in his home. When he was arrested, more than 30 young women came forward alleging Campbell had taken pictures and assaulted them. With exclusive access to police archive, we chart the investigation which became Essex Police�۪s largest murder investigation. And, we find out how they ...

3.title: Our Daughter and Granddaughter Were Murdered on the Same Day
3.plot: In February 2010, the nation were shocked when beautiful 19 year old Nikitta Grender was murdered, just days before she was due to give birth to her daughter Kelsey May. Nikitta was raped, stabbed and had her flat set on fire in Newport, South Wales. Her killer was the best friend and cousin of Nikitta�۪s Fiance Ryan Mayes - Carl Whant. For the first time on television, In this incredibly emotional and powerful programme, we hear from all of those closest to Nikitta as well as discovering how Gwent Police caught Whant. Whant was a drug addict and social ...

4.title: Two Sisters, One Rapist... Our Dad!
4.plot: In a story of familial sexual abuse, we hear from sisters Nicola and Emma, who were abused by their father Kevin Twomey over a period of 12 years in Port Talbot, South Wales. Twomey was a well respected member of the community who raised money for charity by playing Santa at local community fund raisers. Emma was ten years old and Nicola just five when the abuse started which culminated in the horrific rape on Nicola when she was 17. Nicola and Emma found the strength to go the police and we have exclusive footage of their video statements to police where they ...

5.title: My Mum Was Murdered by Her Stalker Ex
5.plot: In February 2011, 45 year old Lorna Smith was murdered in Brixton, South London, by her ex partner Clifford Mills. In a case that sparked a new stalking law being introduced, Mills had been stalking Lorna over the internet using a fake profile and calling himself Charlie Manning. Mills stabbed Lorna and slit her throat before handing himself in and claiming his alter ego ���Stan�۝ had killed Lorna, a reference to Stan Laurel - Who Mills was obsessed with. Mills tries to claim diminished responsibility but police discover he plotted ...

6.title: Gun Fanatic Shoots Dead His Family
6.plot: On New Year's Day 2012, suicidal taxi driver, Michael Atherton, went on a destructive shooting spree in his family home in Horden, killing three women before pulling the trigger on himself. Among the victims were his partner, Susan McGoldrick, her niece, Tanya Turnbull, and Tanya's mother, Alison Turnbull.

7.title: Britain's First White Honour Killing
7.plot: In 2010, a young woman's body is found in a canal, having been killed by her Muslim lover after shaming him in front of his family; this would be known as the first white honour killing.

8.title: My Mother and Brother Murdered My Father
8.plot: The murder of a 50 year old Gameskeeper Nigel Bacon in November 2008. This was a contract killing. Nigel�۪s wife Susan and his son Michael hired hitman Peter Jacques to kill Bacon. It was described as a crime of greed and loathing. Nigel had a history of domestic violcence but also has more than 150 thousand pounds in cash at the family home. Susan and Michael were in debt and wanted him dead. This is the story of Michael�۪s other children. His two daughters from a previous relationship who never got to know their dad and blame Susan, plus ...

1.title: The Murder of Tia Sharp
1.plot: In August 2012, 12 year old Tia Sharp went missing from her Grandmother�۪s home in New Addington South London. It sparked a nationwide search for the missing schoolgirl, but unbeknown to the family and police - Tia had been sexually assaulted and murdered by her step-grandfather Stuart Hazell. Hazell hid Tia�۪s body in the loft where it was discovered more than a week later. Hazell was obsessed with Tia and had been watching violent child pornography in the weeks before her death. In this episode we reveal the extent of Hazell�۪s...

2.title: Three Generations Murdered in One Night
2.plot: In 2012 Carl Mills murdered his girlfriend, daughter and mother-in-law in a house fire. We talk to those left behind about the devastating effects of his crimes.

3.title: We Witnessed Our Sister's Murder
3.plot: In 2012, Kirsty Walk, a young mother, is murdered by her violent controlling boyfriend; tragically she predicted she would die at his hands.

4.title: A Holiday Romance Ends in Double Murder
4.plot: In 2011, Julie Sahin and her daughter Michaela are murdered by Ensor Gol, Michaela's Turkish lover and the father to her young children.

5.title: My Husband Murdered My Children
5.plot: On May 3rd 2008, Rab Thomson brutally stabbed to death his seven year old son Ryan and his 25 year old daughter Michelle who had severe learning difficulties in the family home in Buckhaven, Fife. Thomson murdered the children in revenge after his wife June left him following 27 years of abuse from Thomson. In this powerful episode June and her son Shaun describe their life with Thomson and the events that led to these shocking murders. Thomson laid the children to rest in their beds before cutting his wrists - June found the bodies but Thomson survived. After the ...

6.title: My Pregnant Sister's Body Was Buried Under a House
6.plot: In 1998, the dismembered body of a pregnant teenager is found under a house in Belfast. Shockingly, the girl's killer is her boyfriend, who is obsessed with serial killers and violent sex.

7.title: A Killer Cougar Murdered My Son
7.plot: On Bonfire night 2012, 30 year old Michelle Mills murdered her toyboy boyfriend Eddie Miller in their cottage in Scalford, Leicestershire. Mills stabbed Eddie more than 20 times. Mills had a history of threatening partners with knives and had done so to Eddie previously. This is the story told by Eddie�۪s mum and those closest to him. Plus we hear from the neighbour who hard the attack that night. Mills claimed she was a victim of domestic abuse, but the judge described her as a conniving individual who had tried to hoodwink the jury when he convicted her...

8.title: A Twins' Story: Our Uncle Raped Us
8.plot: Identical twin sisters Rachael and Tracy were raped by their uncle John McCallum when they were just five years old. The abuse lasted over a period of eight years until they were 13. The sisters lives were ruined by the abuse but in 2012 they broke almost 30 years of silence and told each other what had happened. Courageously they went to the police and their uncle was convicted and sentenced to 10 years in prison. This is the journey of two young girls who had their childhoods stolen but through the strength of their relationship managed to get justice in the end.

1.title: My Sister Was Murdered at Work by Her Ex
1.plot: Chloe Gazzard discusses how her sister Hollie was stabbed to death by her ex-boyfriend at the salon where she worked in Gloucester.

2.title: Our Daughter Was Tortured to Death by Her Sadistic Boyfriend
2.plot: The parents of Kelly Anne Bates look back on their 17-year-old daughter's relationship with her murderous boyfriend James Patterson Smith, which ended in the girl's death in 1996.

3.title: Living with a Murderer and Feared I Would Be Next
3.plot: Sarbjit Kaur Athwal tells the harrowing story of how her mother-in-law plotted the murder of her young sister-in- law.

4.title: My Boyfriend Murdered My Sister and Best Friend and Made Me Watch
4.plot: Elisa Frank talks about how her former lover Ahmad Otak murdered her sister and best friend in Wakefield, West Yorkshire.

5.title: Two Decades of Torture by the Woman We Called Mum
5.plot: In 2007, Eunice Spry, a seemingly caring mother and devout Jehovah's Witness, is exposed to the world when it is revealed that she subjected three children she was fostering to years of horrific physical and emotional abuse.

6.title: My Mum Was Stabbed to Death by My Son
6.plot: Franky Fenton talks about how her paranoid schizophrenic son murdered his grandmother at her home in Leeds in May 2008.

7.title: The Race to Catch My Stalker
7.plot: Doctor Alison Hewitt discusses how her relationship with Al Amin Dhalla turned into a terrifying nightmare amid his web of lies and deceit.

8.title: My Wife Was Stabbed to Death by Our Son
8.plot: In 2011, Katrina Wardle is brutally stabbed to death. The killer: her mentally unstable son Mark.

9.title: The Black Widower Murdered My Sister
9.plot: The case of Malcolm Webster, who killed his wife Claire in 1994, as told by his victim's brother and the murderer's second wife.

10.title: Our Son Was Conned Then Killed by the Man He Loved
10.plot: Gareth MacDonald's mother and father discuss how their son was brutally killed by his con artist lover in September 2007.

1.title: My Teenage Son: Groomed Online and Lured to His Death - Breck Bednar
1.plot: Breck Bednar was a 14-year-old boy who made online friends through a gaming group. He met 18 year old Lewis Daynes who described himself as the owner of a multi-million pound company and resident of New York. His stories of working in computing for the FBI and earning such high sums of money made Breck look up to him. What he doesn't understand is that, Lewis lives 30 miles away and is controlling and grooming him. Finally, on February 17th, 2014, Breck was lured into Lewis's apartment and was brutally murdered.

2.title: My Son in Law Burnt My Family to Death - Melissa Crook
2.plot: In 2011, in Chatham, a young woman, her baby son and her father die in a house fire. The killer is revealed to be the baby's father and the woman's controlling ex-lover, who did this to spite his girlfriend for leaving him.

3.title: My Disabled Daughter
3.plot: Gemma Hayter, a 27-year-old woman with a learning disability was stabbed and beaten to death near a railway track.

4.title: Our Daughter Murdered in Snuff Movie Fantasy
4.plot: On May 26, 2013, porn-obsessed killer Jamie Reynolds lured 17-year-old Georgia Williams to his home where he hanged her and took photographs of himself sexually assaulting her. He then dumped her body in woodland and went on the run. Georgia�۪s father Steve, a serving police officer, and mother Lynette, tell us how they discovered the sickening details of their daughter�۪s death and the devastating impact it�۪s had on their lives. We hear how Reynolds has been jailed for life, branded a potential serial killer and told he will ...

5.title: My Daughter: Stalked, Then Murdered by Her Ex
5.plot: Rana Faruqui�۪s former boyfriend Stephen Griffiths refused to accept that their relationship, which had only lasted a few months, was over and that Rana wanted nothing more to do with him. He stalked her for several weeks and on August 2, 2003, he stabbed her to death with an eight inch serrated hunting blade. Rana was in a field fetching her horse in for the night when she was attacked and repeatedly stabbed. Griffiths was jailed for life but is eligible for parole in 2017. Rana�۪s mother, Carol Faruqui, and siblings, Simon and Gemma, tell ...

6.title: My Sister and Her Two Year Old Murdered by Her Ex
6.plot: In the summer of 2011, Christine Chambers and her young daughter are murdered at their home in Essex by her controlling violent ex husband. After a failed suicide attempt, he survives to face justice.

7.title: My Pregnant Daughter Was Strangled to Death by Her Boyfriend
7.plot: On December 3, 2013, Ben Blakeley flew into a rage and strangled his teenage girlfriend Jayden Parkinson to death after she told him she was pregnant. He dumped the 17-year-old�۪s body in a ditch and then, a few days later, buried her in his uncle�۪s grave. Her body wasn�۪t found for more than two weeks. Jayden�۪s mother, Samantha Shrewsbury, tells us of her deep sense of loss and how she tried to get her daughter to end her violent and abusive relationship with evil Ben Blakeley. Former Detective Superintendent ...

8.title: My Stepdad Abused Us for 12 Years
8.plot: Louise Turnbull was subjected to years of horrific sexual abuse at the hands of her stepfather Albert Maughan. Throughout her childhood, she was raped and indecently assaulted by the man she was supposed to trust. The abuse started at the age of three and continued for the next 12 years. In April, 2015, Maughan was jailed for 16 years, convicted of 23 counts of historic sex offences including rape and attempted rape. Now aged 43, Louise has waived her right to anonymity to give her first television interview about her lost childhood. Former Detective Superintendent ...

imdb.title: Britain's Darkest Taboos
plot: Reality series interviewing people/families who were victims of violent crimes or people who were friends / family of murderers and rapists and had narrow escapes
synopsis: Britains Darkest Taboos is the, shocking, true-life crime series that tells the story of some of the most sickening acts of familial crime imaginable.No subject is off limits, from incest and rape to child destruction and murder. Britains Darkest Taboos is every familys worst nightmares, relived and retold firsthand by the family and friends at the heart of events, as well as Police Officers involved in the case.Each episode reveals the timeline of events with accurate reconstructions, home footage, family photos, archive news and exclusive access to previously unseen police footage.With expert analysis from Forensic Psychologist Dr Keri Nixon and Psychologist Emma Kenny, Britains Darkest Taboos shows how the acts of one individual can send shockwaves through the lives of those closest to them.
